mapper.select: select * , DATE_FORMAT(end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as limit_day from mydb.events where 1=1 and end_time <= #{endTime} and is_in_progress is true
mapper.update: update events set is_in_progress = false where 1=1 and id in ( select id from events where 1=1 and is_in_progress is true and end_time < #{endTime} ) and is_in_progress is true
mapper.select: select id ,title ,start_time ,end_time ,description ,image as thumbnailImg ,url ,is_in_progress ,category from events where start_time >= #{startTime} and start_time <= #{endTime} and is_in_progress is true
